roleset.name: make fit nicely
roleset.note: TAILOR-V NOTES: Member of Vncls captain-29.8-1. And not one mention of a well-tailored suit. What is the world coming to? (from tailor.01-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: Judie MacDonald, vice president of retail sales at Barnett Banks Inc. of Jacksonville, Fla., says [the company]-1 now targets sub-segments within the market by *trace*-1 tailoring its popular Seniors Partners Program to various life styles.

example.name: more commonly passive
example.text: Still, bankers expect packaging to flourish, primarily because more customers are demanding that [financial services]-1 be tailored *trace*-1 to their needs.
